skills.description: Learn the basics of Python programming, including variables, data types, and basic operations.

steps.title: Variables and Data Types
steps.explanation: Understand how to declare variables and assign values of different data types like integers, floats, strings, and booleans. This is the foundation for storing and manipulating data in Python.
steps.exercise: Create variables for your name, age, and height, and print their values.
steps.tip: Choose descriptive variable names for better readability.

sub_steps.title: String Manipulation
sub_steps.explanation: Learn to concatenate strings, slice them, and use built-in string methods. Strings are fundamental for working with text data.
sub_steps.exercise: Create a string variable, extract a substring, and convert it to uppercase.
sub_steps.tip: Use f-strings for easy string formatting.

skills.description: Learn the fundamentals of video editing to create engaging content.

steps.title: Import and Organize Footage
steps.explanation: Import your video clips, audio files, and images into your editing software and organize them for easy access.
steps.exercise: Create a new project in your editing software and import 3-5 short video clips. Create bins (folders) to categorize them.
steps.tip: Use descriptive names for your files and folders to stay organized.

sub_steps.title: Understanding the Interface
sub_steps.explanation: Familiarize yourself with the timeline, source monitor, and program monitor.
sub_steps.exercise: Locate these key panels in your software.
sub_steps.tip: Customize your workspace for optimal workflow.

skills.description: Learn to prepare delicious and aromatic chicken biryani, a popular South Asian dish.

steps.title: Prepare the Chicken Marinade
steps.explanation: Marinating the chicken infuses it with flavor and tenderizes it. Combine yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, spices, and lemon juice with the chicken and let it rest.
steps.exercise: Mix 1 kg chicken with 1 cup yogurt, 2 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tbsp biryani masala, 1 tsp turmeric, salt to taste, and juice of 1 lemon. Marinate for at least 1 hour.
steps.tip: Marinate the chicken overnight for best results.

sub_steps.title: Sauté Onions and Spices
sub_steps.explanation: Fry sliced onions until golden brown and add whole spices to release their aroma. This forms the base flavor of the biryani.
sub_steps.exercise: Heat oil, add sliced onions and fry until golden brown. Add bay leaves, cardamom, cloves, and cinnamon sticks and sauté for a minute.
sub_steps.tip: Fry onions evenly to avoid a bitter taste.

skills.description: Learn to identify Pokemon based on their attributes.

steps.title: Observe the Appearance
steps.explanation: Note the Pokemon's color, shape, and any distinguishing features.
steps.tip: Pay attention to details like ears, tails, and patterns.

sub_steps.title: Identify Key Features
sub_steps.explanation: Focus on unique characteristics like horns, wings, or specific markings.
sub_steps.exercise: What is unique about Charizard's appearance?
sub_steps.tip: Consider what makes the Pokemon stand out.

steps.title: Consider the Type
steps.explanation: Determine the Pokemon's type (e.g., Fire, Water, Grass) based on its appearance and abilities.
steps.exercise: What type do you think Bulbasaur is?
steps.tip: Type often relates to the Pokemon's environment or powers.

sub_steps.title: Learn Type Matchups
sub_steps.explanation: Understand which types are strong or weak against others.
sub_steps.exercise: Which type is effective against Water-type Pokemon?
sub_steps.tip: Use a type chart for reference.

steps.title: Research the Pokedex
steps.explanation: Use the Pokedex to confirm your identification and learn more about the Pokemon.
steps.exercise: Look up a Pokemon in the Pokedex and read its description.
steps.tip: The Pokedex provides detailed information about each Pokemon.

sub_steps.title: Read the Description
sub_steps.explanation: Pay attention to the description, as it often contains clues about the Pokemon's identity and behavior.
sub_steps.exercise: What does the Pokedex say about Pikachu's cheeks?
sub_steps.tip: Descriptions provide context to physical attributes.
